node.title: Dance Dance Revolution A3 adds Kanaria's KING, Yoidore Shirazu
node.description: Konami's Dance Dance Revolution A3 on Twitter announced the addition of Kanaria's hit track KING as well as Yoidore Shirazu. Both songs were added to the game from 10:00am JST on Wednesday, August 10, 2022.

node.title: Multiverse Monarch Releases Music Video for Metamorphosis
node.description: Multiverse Monarch, the VTuber persona of American voice actress and singer Amanda Lee (AmaLee), has released a music video for her track “Metamorphosis”.
